pkgmetadata.longdescription: lib3mf provides Python bindings for the lib3mf library, which implements the 3D Manufacturing Format (3MF). 3MF is an open-source file format for 3D printing that contains complete model information including meshes, materials, colors, and print settings. This package enables reading, writing, and manipulating 3MF files from Python.
lib3mf提供了lib3mf库的Python绑定，该库实现了3D制造格式（3MF）。3MF是一种 用于3D打印的开源文件格式，包含完整的模型信息，包括网格、材料、颜色和打印 设置。此包允许从Python读取、写入和操作3MF文件。
